benchmark_details.name: AraDiCE
benchmark_details.overview: AraDiCE is a benchmark for Arabic Dialect and Cultural Evaluation, consisting of seven synthetic datasets in dialects and Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) to evaluate LLMs on dialect comprehension and generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark Arabic LLMs on their understanding of dialectal Arabic and cultural knowledge across the Gulf, Egyptian, and Levant regions.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Limited coverage of Arabic dialects; primarily focused on Levant, Gulf, and Egyptian dialects.

data.source: Synthetic datasets generated using Machine Translation and human post-editing.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by expert native speakers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human evaluation and established NLP benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in dialect comprehension and generation tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against existing Arabic LLMs such as Jais and AceGPT.
methodology.validation: Results validated through testing on multiple Arabic dialect benchmarks.
